summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tajik Eats food delivery app. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend loads correctly with proper city selection, restaurant browsing, user registration, and authentication flows working. Some minor issues with cart flow due to authentication session management.

integration_issues.issue: User session appears to expire during cart operations, requiring re-authentication

passed_tests: Cities endpoint returning all 4 Tajik cities
User registration with email and password
Restaurant listing and filtering by city
Restaurant detail pages with menu items
Cuisine filtering (Tajik, Fast-food, Japanese, Italian, Caucasian)
Homepage city selector with all 4 cities
User registration form with city selection
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor session management issue in cart flow - user authentication token may be expiring too quickly during extended cart operations. Consider implementing token refresh or extending session duration for better user experience.
